About.Name: Fletcher Green
About.AboutText: I am a fourth-year student at Seattle Pacific University studying computer science. I chose to pursue computer science because I enjoy learning and problem solving. During my time at Seattle Pacific, I have studied multiple programming languages and applied them to unique problems. Outside of classes, I enjoy combining my programming skills with my other passions, like music. I am seeking an internship or entry level job related to software development after I graduate this coming Summer. Please reach out to me if you are interested in my skills or have any opportunities.

Experience.ExperienceText: Through my education at Seattle Pacific University, I have gained the essential foundational experience necessary to thrive in computer science related professions. I have also developed essential communication skills and a sense of responsibility through work outside of college.
Experience.EmploymentText: Wrote Bash scripts to automate the grading of computer science projects. Resolved conflict with students when issues arised.
Experience.SkillsText: These skills were developed through a combination of completing classwork and self study.

Project1.Title: C++ Certified Associate Programmer
Project1.Desc: I completed the C++ Associate Programmer Certification. I was motivated to work toward this certification because I had prior experience using C++ in my classes and I wanted to understand the language deeper.

Project2.Title: Roguelike Deckbuilding Game
Project2.Desc: Proposed a unique variation on the roguelike deckbuilding genre. Selected the Agile Scrum design methodology to structure ongoing team project development.
